web:Create.web:description: 1) Did the implementation go as planned, with the change solving the problem and providing the benefit expected? Yes. 2) Were there any unforeseen difficulties during the implementation? If yes, what happened and what is the back out steps taken? No. 3) Did you meet the scheduled window? If no, how long did the window exceed? Were there any additional downtime? No downtime. 4) If the implementation failed (please refer to Special Instruction column as well); a. If it caused any INC, please provide the INC ticket number b. Explain why it happened i.e. the root cause c. Share the lesson learnt d. Provide steps to be taken to improve the process to ensure it does not happen again e. Provide non-technical explanation of your recovery steps 5) User / Customer satisfaction; a. Did the implementation meet the user's requirement? n/a b. Was the customer satisfied with the implementation? n/a c. Please rate the user/customer satisfaction from 1 to 5 (1 being lowest and 5 Highest) n/a 6) Did we use the most cost-effective manner in the process? n/a 7) Any other lesson learnt? No
web:Create.web:u_justification: We deploy new version of GAPI DevPortal
